scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production nx run-many -t serve -c production --all --skip-nx-cache
scripts.infra:up:dev: docker compose -p nx-microservices-nest -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file docker/.env.compose.dev up -d
scripts.infra:ps:dev: docker compose -p nx-microservices-nest -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file docker/.env.compose.dev ps
scripts.infra:logs:dev: docker compose -p nx-microservices-nest -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file docker/.env.compose.dev logs -f
scripts.infra:down:dev: docker compose -p nx-microservices-nest -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file docker/.env.compose.dev down
scripts.infra:up:prod: docker compose -p nx-microservices-nest -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yaml --env-file docker/.env.compose.prod up -d
scripts.infra:ps:prod: docker compose -p nx-microservices-nest -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yaml --env-file docker/.env.compose.prod ps
scripts.infra:logs:prod: docker compose -p nx-microservices-nest -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yaml --env-file docker/.env.compose.prod logs -f
scripts.infra:down:prod: docker compose -p nx-microservices-nest -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yaml --env-file docker/.env.compose.prod down
